name: Ahri's Adventure
description:
Ahri's Adventure is a 2D platformer game where you play as Ahri, a 13 years old boy who lives in Kenaning Village. One day, he woke up to his mother screaming at a monster trying to invade their house! Turns out, the Kenaning Village's river was polluted by unknown chemicals which cause the spawn of those monsters! 

Now, it is up to Ahri and his friends to defend their village from these monsters and find out who pollute their village's river.

Instructions:-

  • Press 'A' and 'D' key on your keyboard to move Ahri left and right.
  • Click on the left mouse button to shoot.
  • Press 'W' key to interact with others.
  • Use spacebar key to jump.
  • Press 'Esc' key to exit fullscreen.

Known Issues:-

  • Volume setting that isn't working properly to change the volume of the game.
  • Mouse cursor that isn't on top of the dialogue GUI.

However, despite the issues that I haven't manage to fix at the moment, I still hope you guys could still enjoy playing the game. Currently, this game has Chapter 1 only. I plan to make another 2 chapters in future. Updates about this game will be posted in Lumilynz Instagram. Thank you for playing this short game and have a nice day :)
